hibernate-mapping.query: select ps.sundayTimeRange, ps.mondayTimeRange, ps.tuesdayTimeRange, ps.wednesdayTimeRange, ps.thursdayTimeRange, ps.fridayTimeRange, ps.saturdayTimeRange, pa.provider.name.firstName, pa.provider.name.lastName, pa.title.category, pa.facility.name, pa from omis.health.domain.ProviderSchedule ps right join ps.providerAssignment pa where pa = :providerAssignment

select ps.sundayTimeRange, ps.mondayTimeRange, ps.tuesdayTimeRange, ps.wednesdayTimeRange, ps.thursdayTimeRange, ps.fridayTimeRange, ps.saturdayTimeRange, pa.provider.name.firstName, pa.provider.name.lastName, pa.title.category, pa.facility.name, pa from omis.health.domain.ProviderSchedule ps right join ps.providerAssignment pa where pa.facility = :facility and (pa.dateRange.startDate <= :date or pa.dateRange.startDate is null) and (pa.dateRange.endDate > :date or pa.dateRange.endDate is null)

select ps.sundayTimeRange, ps.mondayTimeRange, ps.tuesdayTimeRange, ps.wednesdayTimeRange, ps.thursdayTimeRange, ps.fridayTimeRange, ps.saturdayTimeRange, pa.provider.name.firstName, pa.provider.name.lastName, pa.title.category, pa.facility.name, pa from omis.health.domain.ProviderSchedule ps right join ps.providerAssignment pa where pa = :providerAssignment

select ps.sundayTimeRange, ps.mondayTimeRange, ps.tuesdayTimeRange, ps.wednesdayTimeRange, ps.thursdayTimeRange, ps.fridayTimeRange, ps.saturdayTimeRange, ps.providerAssignment.provider.name.firstName, ps.providerAssignment.provider.name.lastName, ps.providerAssignment.title.category, ps.providerAssignment.facility.name, ps.providerAssignment from omis.health.domain.ProviderSchedule ps right join ps.providerAssignment pa where pa.facility = :facility and (pa.dateRange.startDate <= :date or pa.dateRange.startDate is null) and (pa.dateRange.endDate > :date or pa.dateRange.endDate is null)

select ha from omis.health.domain.HealthAppointment ha, omis.health.domain.ProviderInternalReferralAssociation pira where pira.internalReferral.offenderAppointmentAssociation.appointment = ha and pira.providerAssignment = :providerAssignment and trunc(ha.date) = trunc(:date) and pira.internalReferral.statusReason is null and (pira.cancelled is null or pira.cancelled = false) and ha.status is null
from omis.health.domain.IrregularScheduleDay isd where isd.day = :date and isd.providerAssignment = :providerAssignment
